title: 全球首家无人公司开业，OpenClaw 24/7 运营，碾压人类工人
description: 一名 27 岁的独立开发者每月收入数万；
titleZh: 全球首家无人公司开业，OpenClaw 24/7 运营，碾压人类工人
titleEn: World's First Unmanned Company Opens, OpenClaw Operates 24/7, Crushing Human Workers
descriptionZh: 一名 27 岁的独立开发者每月收入数万；
descriptionEn: A 27-year-old indie developer earns tens of thousands monthly with it; a former marketing manager makes money from emails it writes while sleeping; a Berlin dropout earns $127k selling custom skills—the 'iPhone moment' for AI agents has arrived, just the money isn't evenly distributed yet.

title: 王慧文寻求投资OpenClaw领域，再发出“英雄号召”：“欢迎需要资金的联系我”

titleZh: 王慧文寻求投资OpenClaw领域，再发出“英雄号召”：“欢迎需要资金的联系我”
titleEn: Wang Huiwen Seeks to Invest in OpenClaw Sector, Issues Another 'Hero's Call': 'Those Needing Funding Are Welcome to Contact Me'
descriptionZh: OpenClaw 实在是太热了。
descriptionEn: OpenClaw is simply too hot.

title: 新人形机器人团队成立，李想“全押”具身AI：能拯救李汽车吗？

descriptionEn: "The right direction" does not equal "the right timing."

descriptionEn: A small step for Apple, a giant leap for AI programming and development.

title: OpenClaw创始人专访YC：未来80%的应用将会消失

descriptionEn: Recently, Steinberg gave an exclusive interview to the renowned startup incubator Y Combinator, revealing the design philosophy behind OpenClaw's explosive popularity.

title: 价格暴涨6倍，克劳德凌晨推出Turbo模式，网友集体崩溃：比OpenAI还狠
description: Anthropic深夜推出Opus 4.6 Turbo模式，号称速度提升2.5倍，价格却惊人涨了600%。
titleZh: 价格暴涨6倍，克劳德凌晨推出Turbo模式，网友集体崩溃：比OpenAI还狠
titleEn: Price Skyrockets 6-Fold, Claude Launches Turbo Mode in the Early Hours, Netizens Collectively Crumble: Even More Ruthless Than OpenAI
descriptionZh: Anthropic深夜推出Opus 4.6 Turbo模式，号称速度提升2.5倍，价格却惊人涨了600%。
descriptionEn: Anthropic launched the Opus 4.6 Turbo mode late at night, boasting a 2.5x speed increase, yet the price was shockingly hiked by 600%. This unusual pricing has caused global developers to collectively lose their composure, being criticized as "having ugly manners." Is this technological confidence or commercial suicide?
